title: eSIM download, connection error.
content:
Hi,
  I work for and eSim manufacturer (Oasis Smart Sim) and we finally officially have our own eSim profile certified server (DP+) with some profiles from our customers.
  When I try to download our profile from a Pixel 4 a using Sim Manager  and I received the following error code: operation code 9, error code 10014. Look at Android developer Website, it seems that this is related to ERROR_CONNECTION_ERROR: link.

Would you be able to confirm to:
me that the problem is indeed about a connection error? 
give me more detail on why this could be happening? I can telnet my server address from my device. Is there some kind of access list that restrict which profile server a phone can get eSim from?

Happy to share my server URL and even activation code in private!

Cheers,

Maxime.
